DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Economic Impacts e-Heath Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: In addition face-to-face education process currently use CHR , project develop two mode eHealth education . Education mode 1 ( control ) comprise participant educate use CHR 's current traditional face-to-face delivery method , print material write log journal . These participant train use University 's web portal elect access internet-based diabetes information . This allow track type amount diabetes information access participant . Education mode 2 ( static interface ) participant educate use digitized form traditional material provide CHR well electronic log journal ( e-journal ) participant record diabetes-related outcome behavioural information . Education mode 2 assessed approve CHR . Education mode 3 ( dynamic interface ) participant educate use digitized traditional material education mode 2 well enhanced dynamic e-journal ( visualization blood glucose alert ) . In addition , mode provide informative disease-related internet site diabetes news article vet medical team . Participants health professional able electronically discuss content quality information ( discussion board ) . New site article add ongoing basis . Participants also access chat room encourage information share education mode 3 participant health professional CHR . Education mode 3 assessed approve CHR .
